body.name: Air Purifiers for Home Large Room up to 1620ft², AMEIFU Upgrade Large Size H13 Hepa Bedroom Air Purifier for Wildfire,Pets Dander with 3 Fan Speeds, Filter Replacement Reminder, Aromatherapy Function

features: 【High Efficiency HEPA Air Filter】AMEIFU air purifiers for home with the 3-stage filtration system clears out 99.97% of airborne contaminants. 360° air intake, and CADR 160/m³, AMIFU air purifier filters air 6 times/H in 270 sq feet, it only takes An Hour to purify a 1620 ft² room. Perfect for quickly purifying a wide range of contaminants including dust, pollen, pet dander, smoke.

【Filter Replacement Remind & Timing Settings】Our machines are set up with a 1200 hour cartridge replacement reminder, the red indicator light will turn on when the purifier has been in use for more than 1200 hours. For the health of you and your family, we recommend that you replace the filter cartridge once every 6 months. It also comes with a 3-speed timing function, which are 2/4//8H.

【Ultra Quiet Sleep & 3 Fan Speed Settings 】Ultra-quiet sleep mode, as low as 15db, you can sleep peacefully while breathing fresh air. The air speed of the air purifier can be adjusted to low/medium/high 3 levels, so you can adjust the air volume according to the air condition. Notice: level1 is sleep mode

【Auto Mode & Aromatherapy Diffuser】When you not sure which gear is sutitable, Auto Mode is your best choice, it will automatically select the appropriate gear according to the current air quality. Built-in essential oil sponge, you can add a few drops of your favorite essential oils to the top of the air purifier.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Breathe Fresh and Clean Air, Enjoy a Healthy Life
High Efficiency Three-Stage Filtration System for Your Home Previous page Next page

Noticing pet dander and smell? These cute furry friends can come with pet dander and odors that lower our air quality. Are you troubled by recurring allergies? Smoke smell, pollen from table flowers, and airborne dust may cause allergies. Still troubled by the smell of smoke? The stubborn and persistent smoke smell will stick to our clothes, sofa, and it is difficult to get rid of.

Timing Settings A timer for 2/4/8/hours for your different needs. saving unnecessary energy consumption Filter Replacement Remind The red indicator light will turn on when the purifier has been in use for more than 1200 hours Air Quality Detection Light The air quality indicator light will flash alternately for 30s when the machine is running. 3 colors: Green-Healthy/Yellow-Normal/Red-Poor Aromatherapy Diffuser With the operation of the air purifier, it is able to effectively spread clean air and fresh fragrance throughout the room.

How To Change The Filter Remove the new filter protective bag before installation Open the bottom cover (remember that the power adapter is also inside when you use it for the first time)Take out the old filterTake out the new filter element and place it in the air purifier cylinderClose the bottom cover How To Add Essential Oils The strength of the flavor depends on the essential oil. Press to open the top coverDrop your essential oils on the aroma padRestall the coverAroma comes out with clean fresh air in working status.
Every Day You Wake Up Is Happy Breathe freely and sleep soundly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Work great at removing pet hair!
reviews.reviewText: Love this little purifier, it is easy to set up, easy to use, easy to clean, easy to replace the filter. Just seamless all around. Sleep mode is super quiet. I love the way it seems to clean the air of pet hair. I have a cat and she has a thick fluffy coat even though I brush her everyday she still sheds but since I purchased this unit it seems to catch any loose hair flying around!! I highly recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great air purifier
reviews.reviewText: This has cleaned the air in my room enough to where I am no longer stuffed up when I wake up in the morning. In fact, I am now able to breathe through my nose when I sleep. I do not have this unit for 2 weeks. It is very quiet on sleep mode. I sleep with it on #1 fan, and it acts like a slight bit of white noise. This has been a game changer for my sleep and comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well for small room
reviews.reviewText: Been using it for 3 months. You can tell a difference in the air quality in the smaller rooms but putting it in the bigger rooms, can't tell the difference. It is just now saying it needs a filter replaced so I guess that's good time length considering we have a short haired dog that sheds.Can only hear it running when the fan is on level three but it's a soothing noise so not annoying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Set it and forget it
reviews.reviewText: I've had this long enough now to judge it. I have no complaints. It was super simple to set up. The instructions are clear and it's made to be easy. Filter slipped right in, locked into place and it was ready. I set it on Auto (a feature I highly recommend you look for) and haven't needed to do anything since. I hear it speed up from time to time but mostly I don't know it's even running. Good size, nice looking (if it has to live here, that's a plus) very quiet. I'm not sure what else you want. All in all, a good buy. I would let you know that the filters aren't cheap (for any purifier) so look around for the best deals. Definitely a good purchase. I recommend it.Update: I still love this unit. The update is the filters. These filters are not easy to find. There are 2 sellers here that have them, but keeping them in stock seems to difficult. I'll add the links and suggest you grab them when they're there.https://www.amazon.com/PUREBURG-Replacement-Compatible-ClearAir-A2-High-efficiency/dp/B0C1N1MFH8/ref=pd_ybh_a_sccl_3/140-3338014-2494630?pd_rd_w=HR4VB&content-id=amzn1.sym.67f8cf21-ade4-4299-b433-69e404eeecf1&pf_rd_p=67f8cf21-ade4-4299-b433-69e404eeecf1&pf_rd_r=MTS6KEBD066BPA43MM3C&pd_rd_wg=XkC4M&pd_rd_r=412e4957-830f-4349-a4ae-13cb77f3abee&pd_rd_i=B0C1N1MFH8&psc=1https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0C4JML8W8/?coliid=I55I4TI9G665P&colid=2M10JJ5HDOQL2&psc=1&ref_=list_c_wl_lv_ov_lig_dp_it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great performance and value
reviews.reviewText: Great value and amazing performance. Love how it can connect to Alexa. Not noisy and easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works well but filters get expensive
reviews.reviewText: This product works really well and gets all of the dust and debris (as you see in the photo) but the replacement filters are super expensive. I like that you can put essential oils in the little spot on the top, but it doesn’t last super long because the sponge is so small. It is also kind of difficult to clean out the little oil part if you want to change the smell. If these things would not bother you, then this is a good buy. I wanted something where I could clean and reuse the filter since I am trying to go green, so I don’t really advise getting this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bye bye dust
reviews.reviewText: We have CONSTANT dust in our house due to having 4 doggies and 6 bunnies. I ordered two of these and although the dust isn't completely gone, it has helped A LOT!
